msg: Allow for additional JDBC drivers to be used without being a part of project.xml deps

author: taylor
msg: updated schema to work with Oracle
had to comment out the table OJB_DMAP_ENTRIES since it was illegal for Oracle
When and if we ever get the latest version working with J2, I'll update the core OJB tables
Also had to rename the TABLE SECURITY_PRINCIPAL_PERMISSION TO PRINCIPAL_PERMISSION
since the generated names were to long for Oracle

msg: Patch to registry schema, set CLASSPATH columns to 255 from Ate Douma
